website_summaries.verdict: One of the largest drip irrigation systems meant for large gardens and landscapes.
pros: Kit comes with 50' of hose for larger gardens
Nozzles are easy to secure to the tubing without needing many ground stakes
Kit hooks up to any faucet or garden hose
cons: Tubing is prone to kinking and developing leaks around thorny plants

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to install. Owned for 3 months and continues to work as expected. Very well packaged and includes everything you'll need.
customer_reviews.author: Live Free and Buy

customer_reviews.title: Easy install! Minus the adapter for the garden hose.
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Works well, easy to use and install. I have it hooked on a valve at the bottom of my fish tank. Turn it on for an hour, waters all my plants! Only problem is it doesnt have the adapter to fit onto garden hose thread. Ended up using the rubber gasket side instead.
customer_reviews.author: Brian/Claire

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Not worth buying. Save your money and go to a local home improvement store. I got mine installed before realizing it was trash
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, lot of fittings but...
customer_reviews.text: For a product with so many fittings you would imagine it might have several hose attachments, imagine on. There was an injury sustained that made my roommate gag and that was after the brutality of connecting the 1/8 inch id hose to 20 of the pieces, my finger and thumb "De-gloved" whereas the skin on my fingers slid down and tore open. Do not be fooled by the black hose, it is aquarium tubing. The adapters and t's should work with other setups like rainbird.
customer_reviews.author: James Bushey

customer_reviews.title: Major Flaw but Otherwise Great
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this selection gets mixed reviews. It has most all the same fittings as all the others with the exception of it has distributors already on stakes which is great (I would like to buy more of those) and the main fitting that ties it to your source which is a big unusable problem. It doesn't go on to a hose bib it only fits on a 1/2" cpvc or copper pipe. If it wasn't for that major flaw I would have give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Lord

customer_reviews.title: Great set.  Many pieces to make a custom watering system.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. You make a custom watering system for your plants. You can change it up at any time if you need a new set up. Offers many different nozzles. It could use a few more small zip ties that you might want as protection that the water pressure doesn’t separate any of the parts. I just got a separate set. The pieces are a very tight fit inserting into the tube which is good and bad. At times it was hard to slide the pieces into the tube.
customer_reviews.author: C.T.

customer_reviews.title: Complete Irrigation kit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Orbit WiFi timer and for my garden and needed the supplies to setup the irrigation system. This kit had everything you need to make either a simple or complex multi watering irrigation system. I have two fruit trees, a vegetable garden, eight hydranis plants and five hanging basket plants all irrigated using only this kit. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Samson Gebre

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, leaks, does not stay connected, not even worth the small cost
customer_reviews.text: I made a simple run about 15' long using a couple of each spray tips. use warm water to warm the hose to make each connection and double checked each one to make sure the hose was slipped on as far as it could. Immediately turning on the water connections started coming apart. At many of the connections, the host developed many small leaks that some of the connections looked more like a mister. One of the connections I could completely slip the hose on and off. This kit should not even be sold.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Water saver
customer_reviews.text: I was able to keep lawn moist through out the sunny and very hot days while saving water. After a while of usage, The hose expanded and burst. The hose would start bursting through different sections after had cut and fix the previous burst. Other than that works well. Get a pressure regulator although I am not sure if that would had help with hose bursting as the hose it self seems or feel better delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Hopa

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: A piece of junk. You can't get the faucet end tight enough to stop leaking.. The hose is flimsy and the connections also leak. Went to Lowe's and replaced everything. Not everything on Amazon is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: kentuckdave

customer_reviews.title: Pure junk
customer_reviews.text: Instructions do not say anything about hooking to a main line, they give you a hole punch but not telling you what to do with it, Hoses do not stay on and water sprays everywhere, especially when it is 95 degrees outside and the water is turned on it blows off the fittings. Nothing to keep dirt out of the lines and drip and misting heads clog up rapidly. Don't waste your money on this item,,, threw it in the garbage in less than one week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Chas

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the adapter the plastic one did not work on my spicket. Seller sent over a new one immedeately, everything else works great. Excelent value for the money and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyP

customer_reviews.title: Complete Kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit supplies most everything you will need. The fittings are difficult to get on the barbed fittings but once on they stay. 50ft of tubing runs short quick and I would suggest getting a pressure regulator.
customer_reviews.author: markp

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: A lot of variations to do many different types of plants

customer_reviews.title: So many part you can get a drip system & mister system
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome assortment of pieces for either a drip system or mister system; or both. I didn't have time to install it this summer but I'm looking forward to a cool summer next year!
customer_reviews.author: Virgie P in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Theres better products that use easier attaching methods
customer_reviews.text: This product is very complicated the hose is very weak for string pressure and so are the fittings you'll be lucky to make a good drip system with the 50ft the pressure needs to be at least 40psi to manage a decent setup
customer_reviews.author: Matteo G

customer_reviews.title: All you need in a package
customer_reviews.text: Everything I need in a package. Great product,best price and an amazing customer service that will answer all your questions. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for watering patio container plants
customer_reviews.text: We set this up to water all our patio container plants . So much easier than carrying water around to each container. I can enjoy my morning coffee while watering my garden’
customer_reviews.author: Vkw

customer_reviews.title: Distribution hose is very cheap and useless.
customer_reviews.text: I liked all the products included except for the distribution hose. The 1/4 inch hose is of cheap quality and kept coming off when I turn on the water. I went and purchased a hose at Home Depot for $6 and everything was great! For a little more money they could have used a better hose.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Altamirano

customer_reviews.title: Had to rip it out and start over !
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product did not last ! I 've used other systems in past and had great luck . the tubing is very cheap and stretches out so the adapters do not stay on . sets up nicely and seems ok until it's bern in use for awhile .
customer_reviews.author: zoowantabe

customer_reviews.title: "Universal" sink adaptor
customer_reviews.text: Universal sink adaptor is not universal. Doesn't fit my standard sink, very disappointed. I can't even test it to see how the rest of the system works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hoses kept poping off
customer_reviews.text: i have this type system that works great. I added this one to it and the hose kept poping off the fitting. Had to use wire ties to keep the hose from falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time and money!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple to put together. Yet the issue is the fitting will not properly fit on a standard garden hose line . Also the tubing that comes with it is so thing and flimsy it busted the first day. There was also leaks from every part! Return immediately. Going to Lowe’s to get a better line!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not good house quality
customer_reviews.text: Essambly is very easy. The amount of adjustable valve I have and the pressure required to make them work properly makes some of the initial connectors nto come off. The plastic used for the house is not very good. I think to soft and stretchy for the porpoise.
customer_reviews.author: Raiko Exposito

customer_reviews.title: Can use some attachments inside greenhouse and some in garden or flower bed.
customer_reviews.text: Like the sprayers but can’t use inside greenhouse or you will over water and create algae.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P MORGAN

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The tubes are too soft that they cannot hold regular water pressure when the faucet is turned on. They bursed everywhere. Money to the drain. I went to Homedepot to replace the tubes. The drippers and sprayers are OK.
customer_reviews.author: Echo Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Tubing will not stay Connected.
customer_reviews.text: Tubing too soft to stay on the Fittings. Had to Buy Proper Tubing.
customer_reviews.author: SwedeBoy

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: Great kit you can hook up bunch systems with this will stand by it forsure
customer_reviews.author: Porter

customer_reviews.title: Plant watering system
customer_reviews.text: I like the compacted package when this irrigation system shipped to me. The assembling instruction is very clear. All parts have good quality. The pipe is thinner than I thought, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Zhen Sui

customer_reviews.title: Cheap tubing doesn't hold up to water pressure
customer_reviews.text: Having to replace all the tubing with heavier tubing from Lowe's
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: it wasn't what I expected
customer_reviews.text: it wasn't what I expected but it did work as promised
customer_reviews.author: dan w

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Tube busted 2 minutes into first watering. Thanks for the time and money waste.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Q.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is happy with this purchase for our grass
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work!!!
customer_reviews.text: The connector to the hose does not fit. Total waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great deal
customer_reviews.text: A great kit for starting up a watering system for your flowers/herbs/vegetables. I added a battery operated timer to make it automatic.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Robson

customer_reviews.title: It has plenty of spray heads
customer_reviews.text: I like the product it was simple to install although two of the 1/4 tube slipped of the sprayer so I had to put a zip tie to secure the spray head. And zip tie comes in the kit
customer_reviews.author: F.Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother!
customer_reviews.text: When the black tubing is exposed to the sun it blows off the connection.
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Bad item
customer_reviews.text: Good for one or two plants but anything more will not work properly. The line pops off every time water comes on and my water pressure is lower than everage.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: Was setting this up in my green house for my wife and the misting nozzles didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Irrigation
customer_reviews.text: Wife has a lot of pots anf this worked great
customer_reviews.author: Longhorn

customer_reviews.title: Not for misting plants
customer_reviews.text: Hose is made for very low water pressure. Not for misting plants, will bust hose.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product, for the patio plant and drip irrigation system.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. No instructions are included, but it doesn't take a rocket scientist to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and assemble.. It works!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Bought two and may buy a third..Don’t hesitate to buy this kit!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The spray heads worked great. I ran individual lines to each of my flower pots!
customer_reviews.author: Peter J Wolfrom

customer_reviews.title: very bad tube. don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: the tube doesn't stay on the connectors. waste time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I would defiantly buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for my backyard it works very well. Took a while to put together but other than that a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used these products before for our flower gardens and just love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit faucet correctly
customer_reviews.text: Tried this on the correct sized faucet and it would not fit. Thinking it was just the faucet, I tried another faucet and two hoses that had the same measurement. While the rest of the kit is very nice, the most essential piece to making the thing work... DOESN'T. The attachment will make it about 2 turns before it goes off track and gets crooked (see picture for what I mean). Very disappointing to get the whole thing set up and have it come to this.
customer_reviews.author: Bob P.

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a standard hose facet
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed that it does not fit with a standard facet! The pieces were easy to put together, just soak in hot water for 10 seconds as instructed and create customized irrigation. But it’s no good if it doesn’t connect to the water sorce.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DIY Garden Drip Irrigation Kit, Plant Watering System with 50ft 1/4-inch Blank Distribution Tubing Hose Atomizing Nozzles Drippers
feature_bullets: All-in-One GARDEN DRIP SYSTEM: Complete 161-piece drip irrigation kit eliminates watering by hand and can be expanded to cover up 20 pots or plants

US STANDARD BRASS CONNECTORS: Moistenland home irrigation system with 3/4” metal threaded connector, ensures to prevent leaking from the outdoor spigot. which is not easy to break down and more convenient on installation

1/4” BLANK DISTRIBUTION TUBING: Rugged, flexible tubing that's easy to unroll and stake in garden, flower bed, ground cover or other landscaped areas. Used to branch off from 1/2" tubing to run water to 1/4" emitter tubing or emitter devices

EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Just attach to faucet, cut tubing and connect irrigation fittings. Three simple steps to install this garden watering system. Completely customizable drip system kit to water your potted plants, hanging baskets or raised bed
SAVE TIME vs HAND WATERING: Water multiple plants at the same time with one-to-one precision watering by adjust each drip emitter produces healthier plants for longer lasting blooms, greener leaves

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars190 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
